addr: 475 Riverside Drive . (enter at 61 Claremont Avenue) #1 train to 116th St. Columbia University. New York, NY 10026
title: December AmeriCorps Convening
desc:
The Office of Community Schools will convene all AmeriCorps members for the November Monthly Peer Learning Forum on? Tuesday, December 1st 2015, from 9am-5pm.? 
 Breakfast and registration is from 8:30-9am. Programming will begin at 9am. ? 
 
 
 AmeriCorps members will grow their content knowledge in addition to learning specific skills and techniques to ensure that they are equipped to support students within their school communities.? 
 January Metro Cards will be distributed at the event.
